clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
The information we collect from you may be used in any of the following ways :
  1. To perform technical checks;
  2. To fulfill legal requests;
  3. To deliver customer service
  4. To process payment transactions.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: We claim no intellectual property rights over the material you upload to the Service.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
We retain backups of deleted messages and documents for 45 days.
This is for the purpose of restoring data in case of accidental deletion by users.
After 45 days, data will be permanently deleted from all our systems.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell, trade or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information except when forced by Belgian law (see paragraph about Surveillance and law enforcement).

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: Note that Belgium does not have any equivalent to the US NSL (National Security Letter) and gag order, so we cannot be forced to do something without being allowed to disclose it.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text:
• End-to-end encryption (E2EE)
    It is a method used for securing encrypted data while it is moving from source to the destination. In End-to-End Encryption, the data is encrypted on the sender's system and only the intended recipient will be able to decrypt it. Nobody in between (be they an internet service provider, application service provider or hacker, ...) can read it or tamper with it, thereby providing a great deal of confidentiality and protection to all of your communications.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: Should you close your account, all data will be permanently deleted 30 days after the legal expiration date (i.e. the Belgian law imposes 365 days after account closing).

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What information do we collect ?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: No third-party tracking platforms are used
clauses.description: There are no Google Analytics or other tracking codes embedded in the service. Any tracking is performed by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: We do not use Google Analytics trackers.

case.text: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used

clauses.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account
clauses.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.
clauses.clause_text: When logging in with two factor authentication enabled, one must provide not only the login and password, but also a one-time password (because it changes automatically over time).

case.text: Two factor authentication is provided for your account

clauses.title: This service only uses temporary session cookies
clauses.description: Temporary session cookies are cookies that are deleted when you close your browser instead of remaining there until they are manually deleted (or expire). These cookies are only used for the purposes of the service and therefore disappear when it's no longer used.
clauses.clause_text:
• Do we use cookies ?
    Yes. Our cookies are "authentication cookies" and not "tracking cookies": we do not track you after your session on our servers.

case.text: Only temporary session cookies are used

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-08-18 23:13:16 UTC, fedada (30172)  Suspended wrote:
          오피’s comprehensive guide to massage and healing services ensures you receive the highest quality treatments and experiences. 오피

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text:
You expressly understand and agree that the Service shall not be liable for any damages resulting from :<ol>
<li>The use or the inability to use the service

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: The Service may, but has no obligation to, remove by its sole discretion, content which is illegal, offensive, threatening, libellous, defamatory, pornographic, obscene or otherwise objectionable or which violates any party's intellectual property or these Terms of Service.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated on June 21, 2017.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: The Service reserves the right at any time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the services offered (or any part thereof).

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.
clauses.description:
You are responsible for your use of the service. If a claim arises related to that use, you agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless.
If users are also required to defend the service, see Case 146 instead.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to indemnify and hold the Service from any claim, demand or damage, including reasonable attorneys' fees, asserted by any third party due to or arising out of your use of or conduct on the Service.

case.text: You agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text:
You use the Service at your own risk.
The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

clauses.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
clauses.description: Although there's generally a unique binding language for the terms, they are translated to allow all users to understand the agreement they're accepting, no matter their native language.
clauses.clause_text: English Français Español Português

case.text: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will notify you of the changes.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
